001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.drivers.base;
002
003import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
004import org.openqa.selenium.remote.AbstractDriverOptions;
005
006/**
007 * Abstract base class for managing WebDriver setup and configuration.
008 *
009 * <p>This class provides a mechanism to ensure that WebDriver binaries are downloaded only once per driver type,
010 * avoiding redundant downloads across multiple test sessions.
011 *
012 * <p>It utilizes a thread-safe {@link ConcurrentHashMap} to track which drivers have been downloaded.
013 *
014 * <p>The generic type {@code T} represents a specific browser configuration extending {@link AbstractDriverOptions}.
015 * Implementations of this class must define the WebDriver options corresponding to a particular browser.
016 *
017 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
018 */
019public abstract class BaseDriverProvider<T extends AbstractDriverOptions<?>> implements DriverProvider<T> {
020
021   /**
022    * Thread-safe map tracking the download status of different WebDriver binaries.
023    *
024    * <p>The keys represent the driver types (e.g., Chrome, Firefox),
025    * and the values indicate whether the corresponding driver binary has already been downloaded.
026    */
027   private static final ConcurrentHashMap<String, Boolean> DRIVER_DOWNLOAD_STATUS = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
028
029   /**
030    * Retrieves the type of WebDriver that this provider supports.
031    *
032    * @return A {@link String} representing the WebDriver type (e.g., "CHROME", "FIREFOX").
033    */
034   protected abstract String getDriverType();
035
036   /**
037    * Sets up the WebDriver by downloading the necessary driver binary if it has not already been downloaded.
038    *
039    * <p>This method ensures that each driver type is downloaded only once by utilizing
040    * {@link ConcurrentHashMap#computeIfAbsent(Object, java.util.function.Function)} to prevent duplicate downloads.
041    *
042    * @param version The specific WebDriver version to download.
043    */
044   @Override
045   public void setupDriver(final String version) {
046      String driverType = getDriverType();
047      DRIVER_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.computeIfAbsent(driverType, key -> {
048         downloadDriver(version);
049         return true;
050      });
051   }
052
053}
